price: 135. But when We removed the punishment from them to a fixed term, which they had to reach, behold! they broke their word!
arabic: فَلَمَّا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ ٱلرِّجۡزَ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ هُم بَٰلِغُوهُ إِذَا هُمۡ يَنكُثُونَ
